queries.name: IOT platform Wind Turbines faulty
queries.query: select turbine_id, prediction as fault, model, state, lat, long, country from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics where prediction != 'ok' limit 18

queries.name: IOT platform Wind Turbines stats
queries.query: select sum(avg_energy) as energy_produced, sum(avg_energy) * 110 as revenue_per_hour from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics

queries.name: IOT platform Wind Turbines stats faulty
queries.query:
with test as (select status, sum(avg_energy) as energy_produced, avg(avg_energy) as avg_energy, count(*)/10 as count from 
(select *, case when prediction == 'ok' then 'ok' else 'faulty' end as status from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics ) 
group by status)

select *, avg_energy/other_status_avg_energy*10 as efficiency_loss from (select *, LAG(avg_energy, -1) OVER (ORDER BY status) as other_status_avg_energy from test)

-- , LAG(avg_energy) OVER (ORDER BY status) as other_status_avg_energy, other_status_avg_energy/avg_energy

queries.name: IOT platform Wind Turbines faulty parts count
queries.query:
select type, count(*) faulty_equipment_count from (select turbine_id, state, country, prediction as fault, model, lat, long from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics where prediction != 'ok' limit 18) as t
left join dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.part p on t.state=p.stock_location
where stock_available = 0 
group by type
order by faulty_equipment_count desc

visualizations.name: Recurrent equipment default over the last year

queries.name: IOT platform Wind Turbines faulty parts
queries.query:
select EAN, type, approvisioning_estimated_days, state, count(*) c from (select turbine_id, state, country, prediction as fault, model, lat, long from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics where prediction != 'ok' limit 18) as t
left join dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.part p on t.state=p.stock_location
where stock_available = 0 
group by EAN, type, approvisioning_estimated_days, state
order by c desc

queries.name: Turbine power prediction
queries.query: select *, current_timestamp() + interval '1 hour' * h as time from ( select *, hour as h from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.turbine_power_prediction);

visualizations.name: Energy prediction based on the wind forecast

dashboard.name: IOT Platform - Wind Turbine predictive maintenance

options.title: Wind Turbines with default
options.description: The following wind turbines have a potential default and should be inspected

query.name: IOT platform Wind Turbines faulty
query.query: select turbine_id, prediction as fault, model, state, lat, long, country from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics where prediction != 'ok' limit 18

widgets.text:
# Maintenance part analysis & recommendation

Based on our Predictive maintenance model and our stock status, we are able to provide recommendation to better organize our stock and potentially adjust spare parts command.  

The potential use-cases and potential revenue optimizations are huge. As other example we can also run analysis on the faulty equipment history and potentially detect frequent issues to take preventive action on the hardware.

query.name: IOT platform Wind Turbines faulty parts count
query.query:
select type, count(*) faulty_equipment_count from (select turbine_id, state, country, prediction as fault, model, lat, long from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics where prediction != 'ok' limit 18) as t
left join dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.part p on t.state=p.stock_location
where stock_available = 0 
group by type
order by faulty_equipment_count desc

options.description: The following parts are not available close to the faulty wind turbine. Stocks need to be adjusted accordingly.

query.name: IOT platform Wind Turbines faulty parts
query.query:
select EAN, type, approvisioning_estimated_days, state, count(*) c from (select turbine_id, state, country, prediction as fault, model, lat, long from dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.current_turbine_metrics where prediction != 'ok' limit 18) as t
left join dbdemos_lakehouse_iot.part p on t.state=p.stock_location
where stock_available = 0 
group by EAN, type, approvisioning_estimated_days, state
order by c desc
